statement.name: INSERT_SMAKRD
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smakrd( codcia, nrokrd, codofr, jndkrd, pqtkrd, nrocrd, nropin, lgrkrd, fchkrd, horkrd, nrosde, codedf, nroaul, nomaul, nribas, coddbi, disbas, stdkrd, nroexo, nroixo, sqlbkr, tpokrd) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAAEG
statement.sql: UPDATE smaaeg SET codbas=? WHERE nroaeg=?

statement.name: INSERT_SMAPDF
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smapdf (NROPDF, CODCIA, CODRPT, NRORPT, CODPDF, NOMPDF, BINPDF, FCHPDF, FHVPDF, STDPDF, SQLBKR) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
